title: New: THIEF – Don't Let Go (En Vogue Cover)
body:
Having impressed with their re-released debut track [_Friend Lover_](http://admin.

crackintheroad.com/music/26432-new-thief-friend-lover/), London duo **THIEF** have released a cover of En Vogue’s 1996 hit [Don’t Let Go](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=__DYyVAz7qQ). Stripping the song back to it’s core, in a way that GEMS did with Seal’s [Don’t Cry](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/26345-new-gems-dont-cry-seal-cover/), it’s emotionally fraught, and further indication of just what these guys may well be capable of in the future. Stream it below, and keep up with THIEF on [Facebook](http://facebook.com/thiefthemusic).

Stripping the song back to it’s core, in a way that GEMS did with Seal’s Don’t Cry, it’s emotionally fraught, and further indication of just what these guys may well be \[…\]
